lead_paragraph: Paddy McNair's season-ending knee injury is a "real shame" as the defender was just about settling into his groove at Sunderland, manager David Moyes has said.

headline.print_headline: McNair's Season-Ending Injury a Real Shame, Says Moyes
headline.main: McNair's Season-Ending Injury a Real Shame, Says Moyes

snippet: Paddy McNair's season-ending knee injury is a "real shame" as the defender was just about settling into his groove at Sunderland, manager David Moyes has said....
